movie.title: Around the World in Eighty Days
movie.plot: Based on the famous book by Jules Verne the movie follows Phileas Fogg on his journey around the world. Which has to be completed within 80 days, a very short period for those days.

movie.title: Paranormal Activity 3
movie.plot: In 1988, an entity begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi in this prequel to the 'Paranormal Activity' series.
